S

SerialPortComm - Class in com.zephyr.internal
This class acts as a bridge between the SerialPort communication profile and the rest of the code.
SerialPortComm(SerialPort) - Constructor for class com.zephyr.internal.SerialPortComm
Creates a new SerialPortComm object to work with
setBrightness(Short) - Method in class com.zephyr.pixy.Pixy
Sends information to the Pixy to adjust the brightness (exposure) of the camera itself, note that the Short value is converted to an 8 bit value ranging from 0-255.
setLED(Short, Short, Short) - Method in class com.zephyr.pixy.Pixy
Sends information to the Pixy to adjust the color of the LED.
setPanTilt(Short, Short) - Method in class com.zephyr.pixy.Pixy
Sends information to the Pixy to adjust the pan and tilt of the Pixy using the servo mount attachment TODO Verify this works with SPI specifically, while it needs to be verified with all communication types, SPI might have to ordered Big Endian not little Endian
SPIComm - Class in com.zephyr.internal
Not ready for prime time yet, the Pixy does weird stuff to deal with the simultaneous send/receive that SPI is capable of.
SPIComm(SPI) - Constructor for class com.zephyr.internal.SPIComm
Creates a new SPIComm object to work with
